title: [BUG] mlflow autolog failed to log xgboost metrics like train_mse, train_mae etc

labels.name: area/uiux
labels.description: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server

labels.name: area/tracking
labels.description: Tracking service, tracking client APIs, autologging

body: ### Issues Policy acknowledgement - [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md) ### Willingness to contribute Yes. I would be willing to contribute a fix for this bug with guidance from the MLflow community. ### MLflow version 1.26.0 ### System information - **CentOS Linux 7 (Core)**: - **3.9.1**: ### Describe the problem I use `mlflow.autolog` before the xgboost model training, but no `train_mse`, `train_mae` metrics tracked in the mlflow UI ### Tracking information MLflow version: 1.26.0 Tracking URI: file:///home/xxx/pipeline_runs/lite/debug/mlruns Artifact URI: file:///home/xxx/pipeline_runs/lite/debug/mlruns/0/004574d1587d4d54b0c89ee95d32b0df/artifacts ### Code to reproduce issue ```python mlflow.autolog(log_models=False) func(*args, **kwargs) mlflow.autolog(disable=True) ``` ### Stack trace No error observed by now ### Other info / logs _No response_ ### What component(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `area/artifacts`: Artifact stores and artifact logging - [ ] `area/build`: Build and test infrastructure for MLflow - [ ] `area/docs`: MLflow documentation pages - [ ] `area/examples`: Example code - [ ] `area/model-registry`: Model Registry service, APIs, and the fluent client calls for Model Registry - [ ] `area/models`: MLmodel format, model serialization/deserialization, flavors - [ ] `area/pipelines`: Pipelines, Pipeline APIs, Pipeline configs, Pipeline Templates - [ ] `area/projects`: MLproject format, project running backends - [ ] `area/scoring`: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs - [ ] `area/server-infra`: MLflow Tracking server backend - [X] `area/tracking`: Tracking Service, tracking client APIs, autologging ### What interface(s) does this bug affect? - [X] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server - [ ] `area/docker`: Docker use across MLflow's components, such as MLflow Projects and MLflow Models - [ ] `area/sqlalchemy`: Use of SQLAlchemy in the Tracking Service or Model Registry - [ ] `area/windows`: Windows support ### What language(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `language/r`: R APIs and clients - [ ] `language/java`: Java APIs and clients - [ ] `language/new`: Proposals for new client languages ### What integration(s) does this bug affect? - [ ] `integrations/azure`: Azure and Azure ML integrations - [ ] `integrations/sagemaker`: SageMaker integrations - [ ] `integrations/databricks`: Databricks integrations
